channel.title: How do I fix a file path?
channel.description:
Hey, I need to set a new file path for my server since its not using the right one... like it thinks all my logs and data is in C:\Documents and Settings\test\Desktop\FuryScape\logs\banlogs.txt, but my real path is, documents and settins/joannelu/desktop/furyscape v2/logs/banlogs.txt... so yeh...
Like this look, I tried banning some1 but it couldn't find the banlog.txt since it doesn't have the right path...
[code]Admin:V 3 N 0 M is banning 3 tessszztterr java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\te st\Desktop\FuryScape\logs\banlogs.txt (The system cannot fi nd the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Metho d) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:9858) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17635) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13865) at client.process(client.java:13835) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:48)[/code]

item.title: How do I fix a file path?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey, I need to set a new file path for my server since its not using the right one… like it thinks all my logs and data is in C:\Documents and Settings\test\Desktop\FuryScape\logs\banlogs.txt, but my real path is, documents and settins/joannelu/desktop/furyscape v2/logs/banlogs.txt… so yeh…

Like this look, I tried banning some1 but it couldn’t find the banlog.txt since it doesn’t have the right path…

Admin:V 3 N 0 M is banning 3 tessszztterr java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\te st\Desktop\FuryScape\logs\banlogs.txt (The system cannot fi nd the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Metho d) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:9858) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17635) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13865) at client.process(client.java:13835) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:48)
